pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Concentration-Time Profiles from Linear PK Systems // Generate concentration-time profiles from linear pharmacokinetic (PK) systems, possibly with first-order absorption or zero-order infusion, possibly with one or more peripheral compartments, and possibly under steady-state conditions. Single or multiple doses may be specified. Secondary (derived) PK parameters (e.g. Cmax, Ctrough, AUC, Tmax, half-life, etc.) are computed.
